chapters.title: Chapter 7:  Pitfalls and Tripwires
chapters.info: Lady Elenia Sarand, p. 151 (182)—Shewish, honey-haired Andoran noble with an eye for Rand. Her husband Jarid opposed Morgase during the Succession. Dyelin exiled her from Caemlyn, as Morgase did long ago, for attempting to take the Lion Throne.
